wikipedia_page.main: John Anson Brightman, Baron Brightman, PC (20 June 1911 – 6 February 2006) was a British barrister and judge who served as a law lord between 1982 and 1986.

response: *John Brightman, Baron Brightman, 94, UK lawyer and former Lord of Appeal.
